name: Fate Of Jiafei
description:
!WARNING!
ALL THESE INFORMATION, EVENTS AND ANOMALIES ARE FAIRY TALES AND ARE NOT JUSTIFIED!!! THIS IS MADE FOR THE FAN HORROR GAME!!!

THE GAME IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR THE WEAK OF NERVE OR FOR THOSE WHO HAVE A PHOBIA FOR HORRORS!!!!

this game therefore speaks about this anomaly from the Turkmen SSR and from China, which is one of the killers of these countries, your task is to collect 30 products, and also find recipes for the ritual to get rid of from Asian, but it's not that easy, you have to be careful and attentive!

the player is a 13-year-old boy from the Byelorussian SSR whose younger sister is missing due to this anomaly late at night.

Features for Android:

  • Android Version not less than 8.
  • Processor: Snapdragon 778G, Snapdragon 888 etc.
  • Memory: at least 500 Mb
  • The game is not adapted to all devices including: Budget, etc, except those that have Snapdragon 888 etc. It can not work on the Android old version and can sometimes clog a little memory.
